377	But	O

377	rise	O
377	.	O

378	In	O
378	a	O
378	nutshell	O
378	,	O
378	benchmarking	O
378	means	O
378	that	O
378	companies	O
378	compare	O
378	their	O
378	energy	O
378	efficiency	O
378	with	O
378	that	O
378	of	O
378	similar	O
378	plants	O
378	abroad	O
378	.	O

379	In	O
379	these	O
379	covenants	O
379	,	O
379	the	O
379	companies	O
379	pledge	O
379	to	O
379	rank	O
379	among	O
379	the	O
379	world	O
379	leaders	O
379	in	O
379	energy	O
379	efficiency	O
379	by	O
379	2012	O
379	.	O

380	In	O
380	return	O
380	for	O
380	their	O
380	commitment	O
380	,	O
380	they	O
380	are	O
380	exempted	O
380	from	O
380	additional	O
380	(	O
380	Flemish	O
380	)	O
380	emission	O
380	restrictions	O
380	,	O
380	taxes	O
380	on	O
380	emissions	O
380	,	O
380	or	O
380	negotiable	O
380	emission	O
380	rights	O
380	.	O

381	Belgian	O
381	industry	O
381	is	O
381	advocating	O
381	benchmark	O
381	covenants	O
381	because	O
381	it	O
381	is	O
381	afraid	O
381	that	O
381	an	O
381	absolute	O
381	limit	O
381	would	S-world
381	weaken	O
381	considerably	O
381	its	O
381	competitive	O
381	position	O
381	with	O
381	respect	O
381	to	O
381	similar	O
381	companies	O
381	in	O
381	regions	O
381	where	O
381	the	O
381	Kyoto	O
381	protocol	O
381	is	O
381	not	O
381	ratified	O
381	.	O

382	However	O
382	,	O
382	this	O
382	disregards	O
382	the	O
382	fact	O
382	that	O
382	arguments	O
382	other	O
382	than	O
382	purely	O
382	financial	O
382	ones	O
382	also	O
382	play	O
382	a	O
382	part	O
382	in	O
382	the	O
382	location	O
382	decisions	O
382	of	O
382	companies	O
382	in	O
382	our	O
382	region	O
382	(	O
382	favorable	O
382	location	O
382	near	O
382	seaports	O
382	,	O
382	availability	O
382	of	O
382	know-how	O
382	,	O
382	well-educated	O
382	personnel	O
382	,	O
382	stable	O
382	political	O
382	climate	O
382	...	O
382	)	O
382	.	O

383	Those	O
383	covenants	O
383	contain	O
383	insufficient	S-intentional
383	guarantees	O
383	in	O
383	themselves	O
383	to	O
383	achieve	O
383	the	O
383	Belgian/Flemish	O
383	reduction	O
383	targets	O
383	in	O
383	an	O
383	economically	O
383	efficient	O
383	manner	O
383	.	O

384	To	O
384	begin	O
384	with	O
384	,	O
384	the	O
384	principle	O
384	of	O
384	benchmarking	O
384	itself	O
384	raises	O
384	questions	O
384	.	O


386	As	O
386	a	O
386	result	O
386	,	O
386	the	O
386	costs	O
386	of	O
386	additional	O
386	restrictions	O
386	on	O
386	emissions	O
386	in	O
386	industry	O
386	must	S-intentional
386	be	O
386	compared	O
386	with	O
386	those	O
386	of	O
386	other	O
386	sectors	O
386	,	O
386	such	O
386	as	O
386	the	O
386	transport	O
386	sector	O
386	,	O
386	households	O
386	,	O
386	the	O
386	service	O
386	sector	O
386	,	O
386	and	O
386	so	O
386	forth	O
386	.	O

387	Benchmarking	O
387	guarantees	O
387	only	O
387	that	O
387	companies	O
387	belong	O
387	to	O
387	the	O
